name: Mazed By You
description:
This is a Unity 1 Final Exam that I have done.

It is a Maze/Dungeon like game where you collect coins to increase your score, and get the key to unlock the door to win the game! Fight enemies along the way!

I am just looking for positive/negative feedback, what I can do to improve my game development skills and just how to improve my overall game level design. Thanks so much and I appreciate all the feedback. <3

-Amanda Coler
